items.sentence: Tom knew the truth, but he didn\'t let anyone know that he knew it.
I\'m glad you didn\'t tell Tom. That would\'ve ruined the surprise.
When would Tom like me to come over and help him with his homework?
Will you have a little time this weekend to help me with my French?
There\'s nothing you could\'ve done to prevent that from happening.
This isn\'t the first time it\'s snowed in Boston on Christmas Day.
After driving for eight hours, Tom just couldn\'t drive any longer.
I confessed to something I didn\'t do because I was being tortured.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who helped you paint the fence.
I didn\'t leave my house because I figured I was pretty safe there.
